title: Platform Validation
description: Validates content against strict platform requirements. Identifies cases where custom content overrides vanilla Minecraft identifiers, which may cause compatibility issues or unexpected behavior.

fields.title: Entity Override
fields.description: Warning when a custom entity uses a 'minecraft:' prefixed identifier. This overrides vanilla entity behavior and may cause conflicts with Minecraft updates.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the minecraft: identifier being overridden

fields.title: Runtime ID Override
fields.description: Warning when a custom entity uses a runtime_identifier that references a vanilla Minecraft entity. While useful for inheriting behaviors, it may cause unexpected interactions.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the runtime_identifier being used

fields.title: Item Override
fields.description: Warning when a custom item uses a 'minecraft:' prefixed identifier. This overrides vanilla item behavior and may cause conflicts with Minecraft updates.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the minecraft: item identifier being overridden
